memberdef.name: write_IMDgroup_to_file

briefdescription.para: Writes out the group of atoms selected for interactive manipulation.

detaileddescription.para: Called by grompp. The resulting file has to be read in by VMD if one wants it to connect to mdrun.

parameterdescription.para: Only springs into action if bIMD is TRUE. Otherwise returns directly.
Structure containing MD input parameters, among those the IMD data structure.
The current state of the MD system.

briefdescription.para: Make a selection of the home atoms for the IMD group.

detaileddescription.para: Should be called at every domain decomposition. Each node checks which of the atoms from "ind" are local and puts its local atom numbers into the "ind_local" array. Furthermore, in "xa_ind" it is stored at which position each local atom belongs in the assembled/collective array, so that on the master node all positions can be merged into the assembled array correctly.

parameterdescription.para: Only springs into action if bIMD is TRUE. Otherwise returns directly.

briefdescription.para: Send positions from rvec.

detaileddescription.para: We need a separate send buffer and conversion to Angstrom.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the IMD private data.
Prepare the socket on the MASTER.
Disconnect the client.
Prints an error message and disconnects the client.
Check whether we got an incoming connection.
Wrap imd_tryconnect in order to make it blocking.

detaileddescription.para: Used when the simulation should wait for an incoming connection.

briefdescription.para: Make sure that our array holding the forces received via IMD is large enough.
Reads forces received via IMD.
Prepares the MD force arrays.
Copy IMD forces to MD forces.

detaileddescription.para: Do conversion from Cal->Joule and from Angstrom -> nm and from a pointer array to arrays to 3*N array.

briefdescription.para: Return TRUE if any of the forces or indices changed.
Fill the old_f_ind and old_forces arrays with the new, old values.
Returns TRUE if any component of the two rvecs differs.
Write the applied pull forces to logfile.
Synchronize the nodes.
Reads header from the client and decides what to do.

memberdef.name: init_IMD

briefdescription.para: Initializes (or disables) IMD.

detaileddescription.para: This function is called before the main MD loop over time steps, and it must be called prior to any call to dd_partition_system if in parallel.

parameterdescription.para: The inputrec structure containing the MD input parameters including a pointer to the IMD data structure.
The topology of the whole system.
The starting positions of the atoms.
